de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing
Class ToolBarBuilder

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing.ToolBarBuilder

public final class ToolBarBuilder
extends Object

This builder offers a internal DSL for creating tool bars. Example: JToolBar toolbar = ToolBarBuilder.builder() .button("/de/weltraumschaf/swing/folder_16x16.gif") .toolTipText("Open an existing document.") .addListener(new Listener()) .end() .button("/de/weltraumschaf/swing/disk_16x16.gif") .toolTipText("Save current document.") .addListener(new Listener()) .end() .button("/de/weltraumschaf/swing/page_16x16.gif") .toolTipText("Create a new document.") .addListener(new Listener()) .end() .create();

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
